ingredients.item: 2 medium essential Waitrose Free Range Eggs
1 tbsp light soft cheese with chives

instructions.step: Whisk the eggs, soft cheese and milk together in a large mug (approximately 300ml) and stir in the tomatoes. Microwave for 1Â½-2 minutes in 30-second bursts, stirring after each or until scrambled to your liking. Serve on top of the toast.
